info.name: MediLab - Test Management (Verified)
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Test Management Component - All endpoints verified against backend implementation.

**Component Owner**: Afham
**Created**: February 26, 2026
**Last Updated**: February 27, 2026 (Two-Stage Workflow Update)
**Base URL**: http://localhost:5000/api

## Authentication Required
All endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication except login endpoints.

### Login Endpoints (Public):
- **Patient Login**: POST /api/auth/patient/login
- **Health Officer Login**: POST /api/auth/health-officer/login
- **Admin Login**: POST /api/auth/health-officer/login (with Admin credentials)

### Authorization:
- **Patients**: View own released results, manage own subscriptions, download PDFs
- **Health Officers**: Submit results, send notifications, view all data
- **Admins**: All Health Officer permissions + permanent delete

## Total Endpoints: 28
- Authentication: 2 endpoints (public, 3 login variations)
- TestResult Management: 14 endpoints (includes PDF Download, Status History, Update Result, Permanent Delete)
- Notification Management: 12 endpoints

## Workflow:
**Two-Stage Status Flow**: pending → released
- Results submitted with status: **pending** (default)
- Lab staff updates to: **released** (triggers PDF generation)
- Patients can only view/download: **released** results

## Discriminator Pattern Support:
Supports 8 test types with specialized fields: Blood Glucose, Hemoglobin, Blood Pressure, Pregnancy, X-Ray, ECG, Ultrasound, Automated Report.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Login endpoints to obtain JWT tokens. Both endpoints are public (no authentication required).

request.description:
**Access**: Public
**Validation**: validatePatientLogin

Login as patient to receive JWT token with patient permissions.

**Request Body**:
- `identifier` (string, required): Can be member_id, nic, or contact_number
- `password` (string, required): Patient password

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Login successful",
  "data": {
    "patient": {...},
    "token": "<jwt_token>"
  }
}
```

**Token Payload**:
```json
{
  "id": "<patient_profile_id>",
  "userType": "patient",
  "member_id": "M001",
  "full_name": "John Doe"
}
```

**Next Step**: Copy `data.token` and save as `{{patient_token}}`

exec: // Auto-capture patient token after successful login

request.description:
**Access**: Public
**Validation**: validateHealthOfficerLogin

Login as health officer to receive JWT token with health officer permissions.

**Request Body**:
- `identifier` (string, required): Can be employeeId, email, or username
- `password` (string, required): Health officer password

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Login successful",
  "data": {
    "healthOfficer": {...},
    "token": "<jwt_token>"
  }
}
```

**Token Payload**:
```json
{
  "id": "<health_officer_id>",
  "userType": "healthOfficer",
  "role": "Lab_Technician",
  "employeeId": "EMP001",
  "fullName": "Dr. Jane Smith"
}
```

**Available Roles**: MOH, PHI, Nurse, Admin, Lab_Technician, Doctor

**Next Step**: Copy `data.token` and save as `{{health_officer_token}}` or `{{admin_token}}`

exec: // Auto-capture health officer token after successful login
console.log("✅ Health officer token captured automatically");
// Also check if user is Admin and set admin_token

request.description:
**Access**: Public
**Validation**: validateHealthOfficerLogin

Login as admin to receive JWT token with admin permissions (required for permanent deletion).

**Request Body**:
- `identifier` (string, required): Can be employeeId, email, or username
- `password` (string, required): Admin password

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Login successful",
  "data": {
    "healthOfficer": {...},
    "token": "<jwt_token>"
  }
}
```

**Token Payload**:
```json
{
  "id": "<admin_id>",
  "userType": "healthOfficer",
  "role": "Admin",
  "employeeId": "DEMO_ADMIN_001",
  "fullName": "Admin Demo User"
}
```

**Important**: Admin role is required for:
- DELETE /results/:id/permanent (Permanent deletion)
- Other system-wide administrative operations

**Next Step**: Copy `data.token` and save as `{{admin_token}}`

exec: // Auto-capture admin token after successful login
console.log("✅ Confirmed: User has Admin role");
console.warn("⚠️ Warning: User does not have Admin role!");

item.name: TestResult Management
item.description:
Submit and manage test results with discriminator pattern supporting 8 test types.

**All endpoints require JWT authentication.**

body.raw:
{
  "bookingId": "{{booking_id}}",
  "patientProfileId": "{{patient_id}}",
  "testTypeId": "{{blood_glucose_type_id}}",
  "healthCenterId": "{{health_center_id}}",
  "enteredBy": "{{health_officer_id}}",
  "currentStatus": "pending",
  "observations": "Blood glucose test performed after 10-hour fasting period.",
  "glucoseTestType": "Fasting",
  "glucoseLevel": 95,
  "unit": "mg/dL",
  "sampleType": "Venous Blood",
  "sampleQuality": "Good",
  "sampleCollectionTime": "2026-02-27T08:00:00.000Z",
  "fastingDuration": 10,
  "method": "Laboratory Analyzer",
  "referenceRange": {
    "normalMin": 70,
    "normalMax": 100,
    "preDiabeticMin": 100,
    "preDiabeticMax": 125,
    "diabeticMin": 126
  },
  "interpretation": "Normal"
}

request.description:
**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: submitResultValidation + discriminator-specific validation

Submit a new test result. The testTypeId determines which discriminator model is used.

**Base Required Fields**:
- `bookingId` (MongoId, required)
- `patientProfileId` (MongoId, required)
- `testTypeId` (MongoId, required) - Determines discriminator type
- `healthCenterId` (MongoId, required)
- `enteredBy` (MongoId, required) - Health officer submitting
- `observations` (string, optional, max 1000 chars)
- `currentStatus` (enum, optional): pending | released (default: pending)
- `releasedAt` (ISO8601, optional)

**Blood Glucose Discriminator** (example shown):
- `glucoseTestType` (enum, required): Fasting | Random | Postprandial | HbA1c
- `glucoseLevel` (number, required): 0-600
- `unit` (enum, required): mg/dL | mmol/L (default: mg/dL)
- `sampleType` (enum, required): Venous Blood | Capillary Blood
- `sampleQuality` (enum, required): Good | Hemolyzed | Lipemic | Clotted
- `sampleCollectionTime` (ISO8601, required)
- `fastingDuration` (integer, conditional): 0-24 hours (required if glucoseTestType is Fasting)
- `method` (enum, required): Glucometer | Laboratory Analyzer | POC Device
- `referenceRange` (object, required):
  * `normalMin` (number, required)
  * `normalMax` (number, required)
  * `preDiabeticMin` (number, optional)
  * `preDiabeticMax` (number, optional)
  * `diabeticMin` (number, optional)
- `interpretation` (enum, required): Normal | Hypoglycemia | Pre-diabetic | Diabetic | Critical
- `clinicalNotes` (string, optional, max 500 chars)

**Other Discriminator Types**:
- **Hemoglobin**: hemoglobinLevel, unit, sampleType, sampleCollectionTime
- **Blood Pressure**: systolicBP, diastolicBP, pulseRate, patientPosition, armUsed, cuffSize, patientState, measurementTime, method
- **Pregnancy**: result, testType, hcgLevel?, hcgUnit?, method, sampleType, sampleQuality, sampleCollectionTime
- **X-Ray**: uploadedFiles[], bodyPart, clinicalIndication, views[], findings, impression, interpretation
- **ECG**: uploadedFiles[], ecgType, clinicalIndication, heartRate?, rhythm?, findings, interpretation
- **Ultrasound**: uploadedFiles[], studyType, clinicalIndication, findings, impression, interpretation
- **Automated Report**: uploadedFiles[1], testPanelName, testCategory, sampleType, sampleCollectionTime, analysisCompletedTime

**Response** (201 Created):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Test result submitted successfully",
  "result": {...}
}
```

exec: // Auto-capture result ID after successful submission

header.description: Multi-role endpoint: Use patient_token (own released) or health_officer_token (all)

request.description:
**Auth**: Patient (own released) OR Health Officer (all)
**Middleware**: authenticate
**Validation**: idParamValidation

Get detailed information about a specific test result with populated references.

**Patient Access**:
- Can only view if `result.patientProfileId === req.user.id`
- Can only view if `result.currentStatus === 'released'`

**Health Officer Access**:
- Can view any result regardless of status

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "result": {...}
}
```

Result includes populated: patientProfile, testType, healthCenter, booking, enteredBy

header.description: Multi-role endpoint: Use patient_token (own released) or health_officer_token (all)

request.description:
**Auth**: Patient (own released) OR Health Officer (all)
**Middleware**: authenticate
**Validation**: patientIdParamValidation + resultQueryFiltersValidation

Get all test results for a specific patient with optional filters.

**Patient Access**:
- URL `patientId` must match `req.user.id`
- Only returns `status='released'` results (forced filter)

**Health Officer Access**:
- Can access any patient's results
- Can filter by any status

**Query Parameters**:
- `status` (enum, optional): pending | released
- `startDate` (ISO8601, optional)
- `endDate` (ISO8601, optional)
- `testTypeId` (MongoId, optional)
- `page` (integer, optional, min 1)
- `limit` (integer, optional, min 1, max 100)

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "results": [...],
  "pagination": {...}
}
```

**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: patientIdParamValidation

Get all unviewed test results for the authenticated patient. Used for notification triggers.

**Authorization**:
- URL `patientId` must match `req.user.id`

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "results": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: bookingIdParamValidation

Get all test results associated with a specific booking.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "results": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: healthCenterIdParamValidation + resultQueryFiltersValidation

Get all test results from a specific health center with filters.

**Query Parameters**: Same as "Get Patient Test Results"

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "results": [...],
  "pagination": {...}
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: testTypeIdParamValidation

Get all results for a specific test type (e.g., all Blood Glucose results).

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "results": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: idParamValidation + updateStatusValidation

Update the processing status of a test result.

**Request Body**:
- `status` (enum, required): pending | released
- `changedBy` (MongoId, required): Health officer ID making the change

**Status Flow**: pending → released

**Note**: When status changes to 'released', `releasedAt` timestamp is automatically set and PDF report is generated.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Test result status updated successfully",
  "result": {...}
}
```

**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: idParamValidation + markViewedValidation

Mark a test result as viewed by the patient. Records viewing timestamp.

**Request Body**:
- `userId` (MongoId, required): Patient ID (must match `req.user.id`)

**Authorization Logic**:
1. Request body `userId` must match `req.user.id`
2. Result fetched by ID
3. Result's `patientProfileId` must match `req.user.id`
4. Result must have `currentStatus === 'released'`

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Test result marked as viewed",
  "result": {...}
}
```

header.description: Multi-role endpoint: Use patient_token (own released) or health_officer_token (all)

request.description:
**Auth**: Patient (own released) OR Health Officer (all)
**Middleware**: authenticate
**Validation**: idParamValidation

Download the PDF report for a test result. The PDF is automatically generated when result status changes to 'released'.

**Patient Access**:
- Can only download if `result.patientProfileId === req.user.id`
- Can only download if `result.currentStatus === 'released'`

**Health Officer Access**:
- Can download any released result's PDF

**Response** (200 OK):
- Content-Type: application/pdf
- Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="<filename>.pdf"
- Body: PDF file stream

**Error Conditions**:
- 404: PDF not yet generated (result must be released first)
- 404: PDF file not found on server
- 403: Access denied (patients can only download own results)

**Use Cases**:
- Patient downloads their test results
- Health officer retrieves results for patient consultation
- Archiving or printing test reports

header.description: Multi-role endpoint: Use patient_token (own released) or health_officer_token (all)

request.description:
**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: updateResultValidation

Update test result data to correct errors or add additional information. Protected fields cannot be modified.

**Allowed Fields** (varies by discriminator):
- `observations` (string, optional, max 1000 chars)
- `testingPersonnelId` (MongoId, optional)
- Discriminator-specific fields (e.g., glucoseLevel, interpretation, findings)

**Protected Fields** (CANNOT be modified):
- `patientProfileId` - Immutable patient reference
- `bookingId` - Immutable booking reference
- `testTypeId` - Immutable test type reference
- `releasedAt` - Managed by status workflow
- `_id`, `__t`, `createdAt` - System fields

**PDF Regeneration**:
- If discriminator-specific fields are changed (not just observations)
- AND result status is 'released'
- Old PDF is deleted and new PDF is generated automatically

**Request Body Example** (Blood Glucose):
```json
{
  "observations": "Updated observations",
  "glucoseLevel": 92,
  "interpretation": "Revised interpretation"
}
```

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Test result updated successfully. PDF regenerated.",
  "result": {...}
}
```

**Use Cases**:
- Correct data entry errors
- Add missing interpretation notes
- Update findings after consultation
- Revise discriminator-specific values

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: softDeleteValidation

Soft delete a test result. Sets deleted flag but preserves data for audit trails.

**Request Body**:
- `deleteReason` (string, required): Reason for deletion

**Note**: This is the recommended deletion method. For permanent deletion (Admin only), use DELETE /results/:id/permanent

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Test result deleted successfully"
}
```

**Auth**: Admin only
**Middleware**: authenticate + checkRole(['Admin'])
**Validation**: hardDeleteValidation

Permanently delete a test result from the database. This is irreversible and should only be used by administrators.

**Request Body**:
- `deleteReason` (string, required): Reason for permanent deletion (10-500 chars)

**Automatic Actions**:
- Deletes associated PDF file from file system
- Reverts booking status to 'pending'
- Permanently removes result from database (no soft delete flag)
- Comprehensive audit logging before deletion

**Use Cases**:
- Data cleanup for test/demo purposes
- Compliance with data retention policies
- Correcting critical system errors

**Security**:
- Requires Admin role (most restrictive)
- Logs full audit trail before deletion
- Cannot be undone - use soft delete for regular operations

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Test result permanently deleted"
}
```

**Note**: For regular deletion operations, use soft delete (DELETE /results/:id) which preserves data for audit trails.

item.name: Notification Management
item.description:
SMS and Email notification system with reminder subscriptions.

**All endpoints require JWT authentication.**

request.description:
**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: sendResultReadyValidation

Send notification to patient that their test result is ready. Attempts both SMS and Email if provided.

**Request Body** (Nested Objects):
- `testResult` (object, required):
  - `_id` (MongoId, required): Test result ID
  
- `patient` (object, required):
  - `_id` (MongoId, required): Patient profile ID
  - `contactNumber` (string, optional): For SMS (must provide at least one: contactNumber or email)
  - `email` (email, optional): For email (must provide at least one: contactNumber or email)
  
- `testType` (object, required):
  - `_id` (MongoId, required): Test type ID
  - `name` (string, required): Test type name for notification content
  
- `healthCenter` (object, required):
  - `name` (string, required): Health center name for notification content

**Requirements**: Twilio (SMS) and/or SendGrid (Email) configured in .env

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Notifications sent successfully",
  "notifications": [
    {
      "_id": "...",
      "type": "result_ready",
      "channel": "sms",
      "recipient": "+94712345678",
      "status": "sent",
      "sentAt": "..."
    },
    {
      "_id": "...",
      "type": "result_ready",
      "channel": "email",
      "recipient": "patient@example.com",
      "status": "sent",
      "sentAt": "..."
    }
  ]
}
```

exec: // Auto-capture notification ID after successful send

request.description:
**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: None (no body required)

Batch job to send reminders to all patients with unviewed test results older than 3 days.

**Request Body**: Empty (no validation)

**Use Case**: Triggered by scheduled job or manual execution by lab staff.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Reminder notifications sent",
  "summary": {
    "totalPatients": 5,
    "notificationsSent": 10,
    "notificationsFailed": 0
  }
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: sendRoutineReminderValidation

Send routine checkup reminder to patient based on their subscription settings.

**Request Body**:
- `subscriptionId` (MongoId, required): ID of the patient's subscription record

**Backend Process**:
1. Fetches subscription with populated patient, testType
2. Retrieves patient contact info
3. Sends notification via configured channels
4. Updates subscription's lastReminderDate

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Routine reminder sent successfully",
  "notifications": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: idParamValidation

Resend a previously sent or failed notification. Creates a new notification log entry.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Notification resent successfully",
  "notification": {...}
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: idParamValidation

Get detailed information about a specific notification by ID.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "notification": {...}
}
```

header.description: Multi-role endpoint: Use patient_token (own) or health_officer_token (any)

request.description:
**Auth**: Patient (own) OR Health Officer (any)
**Middleware**: authenticate
**Validation**: patientIdParamValidation + notificationHistoryQueryValidation

Get notification history for a specific patient with optional filters.

**Patient Access**:
- URL `patientId` must match `req.user.id`

**Health Officer Access**:
- Can access any patient's notification history

**Query Parameters**:
- `type` (enum, optional): result_ready | unviewed_result_reminder | routine_checkup_reminder
- `channel` (enum, optional): sms | email
- `status` (enum, optional): sent | failed
- `startDate` (ISO8601, optional)
- `endDate` (ISO8601, optional)

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "notifications": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Health Officer only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isHealthOfficer
**Validation**: failedNotificationsQueryValidation

Get all failed notifications for troubleshooting and retry.

**Query Parameters**:
- `limit` (integer, optional, min 1, max 100)

**Use Case**: Lab staff identify delivery problems (invalid phone numbers, email bounces, etc.) and take corrective action.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "notifications": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: subscribeValidation

Subscribe patient to routine reminder for a specific test type.

**Request Body**:
- `patientProfileId` (MongoId, required): Must match `req.user.id`
- `testTypeId` (MongoId, required): Test type to subscribe for reminders
- `lastTestDate` (ISO8601, required): Date of patient's last test (cannot be in future)

**Authorization**:
- Request body `patientProfileId` must match `req.user.id`

**Backend Process**:
- Sets `isActive: true`
- Calculates reminder schedule based on test type intervals
- Returns subscription with nextReminderDate populated

**Response** (201 Created):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Reminder subscription created successfully",
  "subscription": {
    "_id": "...",
    "patientProfile": "...",
    "testType": "...",
    "lastTestDate": "...",
    "nextReminderDate": "...",
    "isActive": true,
    "createdAt": "..."
  }
}
```

exec: // Auto-capture subscription ID after successful creation

request.description:
**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: patientIdParamValidation

Get all reminder subscriptions for the authenticated patient.

**Authorization**:
- URL `patientId` must match `req.user.id`

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "subscriptions": [...]
}
```

**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: subscriptionIdParamValidation

Get detailed information about a specific subscription by ID.

**Authorization Logic**:
1. Fetch subscription by ID
2. Verify subscription's `patientProfileId` matches `req.user.id`

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "subscription": {...}
}
```

**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: subscriptionIdParamValidation + updateSubscriptionValidation

Update subscription with new test date. System recalculates next reminder automatically.

**Request Body**:
- `lastTestDate` (ISO8601, required): Updated date of patient's last test (cannot be in future)

**Authorization Logic**:
1. Fetch subscription by ID
2. Verify subscription's `patientProfileId` matches `req.user.id`
3. Update lastTestDate
4. Recalculate nextReminderDate

**Note**: To deactivate reminders, use the Unsubscribe endpoint instead.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Subscription updated successfully",
  "subscription": {...}
}
```

**Auth**: Patient only
**Middleware**: authenticate + isPatient
**Validation**: subscriptionIdParamValidation

Unsubscribe patient from routine reminder by deleting the subscription.

**Authorization Logic**:
1. Fetch subscription by ID
2. Verify subscription's `patientProfileId` matches `req.user.id`
3. Delete subscription

**Effect**: Stops all future reminder notifications for that subscription.

**Response** (200 OK):
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Subscription deleted successfully"
}
```

variable.description: Health Officer ObjectID from seed script
Admin User ObjectID from seed script (for permanent deletion)
Health Center (Lab) ObjectID from seed script
Blood Glucose Test Type ObjectID from seed script
Hemoglobin Test Type ObjectID from seed script
Auto-captured after Send Result Ready Notification
Generic JWT token. Replace with patient_token or health_officer_token as needed.
JWT token from health officer login (auto-captured)
JWT token from admin login (role: Admin, auto-captured)
